Posts.Content: My eyes don't stop watering, nose is running. Don't use my glasses ... they seem to irritate the area around the nose and face where they sit. Anyone else have the watery eye problem?
Posts.Title: Wateru eyes

Posts.Content: #3 Chemo was yesterday, Nov. 30th. Woke up to what I call the "Chemo glow". Face looks like sunburn and slight swelling of hands, generally warm feeling on my body. Is this normal? Go this afternoon for the Neulasta shot. Steroids kept me up some last night so reasting after getting the shot. Have to take one steroid pill tonight and one tomorrow ngiht, then they will be done.
Posts.Title: Chemo Glow

Posts.Content: Happy to say that Chemo #4, my last is tomorrow morning!!! Accepting prayers for no side effects. Get Neulasta shot on Wednesday afternoon. That usually starts the reactions. Thank you to everyone for their advise on my "Christmas" posting. My oven broke, had to heat everything up in the microwave, thank goodness that worked. 33 rads after Chemo.
Posts.Title: Last Chemo, #4 in the morning!!!!

Posts.Content: Please accept my sincere prayers and sympathy for your great loss.
Posts.Title: I Lost My Sister Today

Posts.Content: Please accept my sincere prayers and sympathy for your great loss.
Posts.Title: I Lost My Sister Today

Posts.Content: Need some positive input! Anyone out there with Stage 1 BC and only Radiology? Really scared of Chemo. Have appt. with Onc. tomorrow.
Posts.Title: BC

Posts.Content: May God keep you in His healing hands today and comfort you as you start your journey to recovery. the infusion day itself is not bad. Yes, do drink lots of liquids to flush out the chemilcals. Take along something to read, a snack, something to drink and think positive thoughts. Let us know your schedule so we can pray for you on the days you go for treatments; prayers are powerful. I am recovering from Chemo #3. This discussion board is full of ladies that have been through it and can answer almost any question you have concerning the experience. Keep writing to us.
Posts.Title: First Chemo today

Posts.Content: Anyone have the name of an over-the-counter eyedrop to use to moisturize eyes. Eyes watering quite a lot, itchy. SE of Taxotere?
Posts.Title: Moisturizing eyedrops
